### Why?

-   Store observations at the touch of a button via BrAPI

    -   From phone (via FieldBook or Excel) to BreedBase

-   Observations are standardized and organized

-   Observations may contain timestamps/ other metadata

-   (Underrated but) plays nicely with Excel

-   Platform agnostic

```{r}
library(QBMS)

```

------------------------------------------------------------------------

### What is it good for?

-   Clearly defined traits

```{=html}
<!-- -->
```
-   Clearly defined trials

-   ALT's

-   Lots of potential for expansion

![2023 NY Hairy Vetch Spring Stand](hairy_vetch_spr_stand.png)

### What isn't it good for?

-   On-the-fly observations/ traits

-   Repeated measurements (may change)

-   Non-standard variables between sites

------------------------------------------------------------------------

![CCB trait ontology](ontology_view.png)

------------------------------------------------------------------------

### Other (minor) hassles

-   Configuring devices (setting up BreedBase login in FieldBook)

-   Passing data in can be finicky (for example, planning a trial)

-   IMO these things can be dealt with but take some patience

-   Nomenclature issues: row - column, not range - row, block vs. replication
